about_the_game:
Time your jumps and double jumps in this challenging 2d runner DEMO level

Set in Bronze Age Ireland. Guide an enchanted slingshot ammo orb from the Druid Mug Ruith's caves to the battlefield of the great mythological showdown between the Fomorians and the Tuatha Dé Dannan, heroes of ancient Ireland.

Leaderboard + Gamepad, Touch and Keyboard Controls added.
2D platformer Action Runner

5 levels across Ireland planned, see www.ogmagames.ie to find out more.
detailed_description:
Time your jumps and double jumps in this challenging 2d runner DEMO level

Set in Bronze Age Ireland. Guide an enchanted slingshot ammo orb from the Druid Mug Ruith's caves to the battlefield of the great mythological showdown between the Fomorians and the Tuatha Dé Dannan, heroes of ancient Ireland.

Leaderboard + Gamepad, Touch and Keyboard Controls added.
2D platformer Action Runner

5 levels across Ireland planned, see www.ogmagames.ie to find out more.
